name: Sweet Potato Fries
description: These addictive seasoned "fries" from Mark Bittman are actually baked, but we promise you won't miss the grease. The spice mix – garlic powder, paprika, salt and black pepper – can be used on regular potatoes as well (you'll just need to increase the baking time a bit).

recipeInstructions.text:
Cut the sweet potatoes into sticks 1/4 to 1/2 inch wide and 3 inches long, and toss them with
the oil.
Mix the spices, salt and pepper in a small bowl, and toss them with the sweet potatoes. Spread them out on 2 rimmed baking sheets.
Bake until brown and crisp on the bottom, about 15 minutes, then flip and cook until the other side is crisp, about 10 minutes. Serve hot.

video.name: Baked Sweet Potato Fries
video.description: These baked “fries” can be ready in about 35 minutes.
